name: ambiguously
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that has or expresses more than one meaning: Some questions were badly or ambiguously worded. The novel ends ambiguously, so I'm not sure what happened. See
ambiguous
More examplesFewer examplesThe question was phrased so ambiguously that people answered No when they meant Yes.Directions shouldn't be written this ambiguously.I wish he’d expressed himself less ambiguously.
